summary: This document appears to be an internal list of positions within Deutsche Bank related to a committee, detailing various roles and individuals associated with the bank's operations in the Americas. It includes names, titles, and legal entities but lacks context regarding their involvement in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Steven Ekert
persons.context: Listed as a Risk Advisor for Deutsche Bank AG, USA.

persons.name: Stuart Clarke
persons.context: Identified as the Chief Operating Officer for Deutsche Bank Americas Holding Corp.

persons.name: Steven Reich
persons.context: Serves as the General Counsel for Deutsche Bank AG in the Americas.

persons.name: Francis Kelly
persons.role: Head of Government and Public Affairs — Americas
persons.context: Positioned as the Head of Government and Public Affairs for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Eric Smith
persons.context: Acts as the Chief Financial Officer for Deutsche Bank AG, Filiale New York.

persons.name: Jan Ford
persons.context: Serves as the Regional Head of Compliance for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Ann Rodriguez
persons.context: Identified as the Regional Head of NFRM for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

persons.name: Rich Weber
persons.context: Positioned as the Head of Anti-Financial Crime for DB USA Core Corporation.

persons.name: Stephen Doka
persons.context: Serves as the Regional Head of Investigation for Deutsche Bank AG.

keyFacts: The document lists various positions within Deutsche Bank related to its operations in the Americas.
All individuals mentioned are associated with Deutsche Bank and hold significant roles within the organization.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
